subtitle: hey welcome to Spirit Science a place
where science and spirituality come
together in a harmonious Fusion of
delight and wonder I know that probably
sounds super over the top or way too
many Sparkles for most people's taste
but the truth is science and
spirituality actually do go well
together like very well together on both
sides too there is a science to
spirituality there are methods and
practices and teachings and
understandings about the nature of
reality that is scientific in nature
that lends itself to one's spiritual
growth and development and likewise
there is a spirituality to science in
addition to the fact that some of the
world's most prominent scientists have
expressed strong consideration and
support for belief in a universal
spiritual Force underlying all things it
is also the case that when one looks
into the science of reality the nature
of existence at the fundamental levels
such as through quantum mechanics we
find an interconnected indivisible Unity
between all things including the
consciousness of the Observer
itself this is quite profound because it
demonstrates that there truly is no
separation in life everything is
connected through time and space and we
are the players in the grand Cosmic
Movie game Adventure of the living
reality that we are a part of so the
question then becomes what exactly do we
want our life to look like do we want it
to be filled with wonder and joy and
curious exploration and beautiful
experiences and interconnectedness with
each other or are we content with the
way that things are right now it seems
that Humanity has grown so much in the
evolution of our species with all of the
technology that we have available today
it might seem that through it there's
nothing that we can't do and yet we must
be aware that there is an entire
dimension of reality that we have yet to
fully understand and explore ourselves
when we really know ourselves both
individually and collectively we realize
how to live in peace wisdom and harmony
with each other and life on Earth
transforms nobody knows exactly what
tomorrow holds but if we hold the light
of Truth love and authenticity brightly
in our hearts then there's no telling
what we can't accomplish this is what
spirit science is all about welcome to
the channel and I hope you enjoy what
you find if you're just getting started
I personally recommend going to our
playlist section and checking out the
original spirit science series from from
the beginning there's a lot of
foundational ground material that we've
covered there and then if you're curious
you can also check out our movies in
another playlist thank you so much for
watching this video and may your journey
forward through life forever be
[Music]
blessed
[Music]
